bits.name: psmOncePerWakupEnabled
bits.description: 1 = enable recording only one single position per PSM on/off mode wake-up period, 0 = disable once per wake-up

bits.name: applyAllFilterSettings
bits.description: 1 = apply all filter settings, 0 = only apply recordEnabled

payload_fields.name: minInterval
payload_fields.description: Minimum time interval between logged positions (0 = not set).

payload_fields.name: timeThreshold
payload_fields.description: If the time difference is greater than the threshold, then the position is logged (0 = not set).

payload_fields.name: speedThreshold
payload_fields.description: If the current speed is greater than the threshold, then the position is logged (0 = not set).

payload_fields.name: positionThreshold
payload_fields.description: If the 3D position difference is greater than the threshold, then the position is logged (0 = not set).

issues: Last field is labeled 'reserved1' instead of 'positionThreshold'

valid_variations.reason: In certain firmware releases (like HPG 1.32), the position threshold functionality may be explicitly disabled or omitted from the documentation, marking those bytes as reserved despite the overall message length remaining 12 bytes.

adjudication.reasoning: The UBX-CFG-LOGFILTER message is very stable across u-blox 8, 9, and F9 series. It consistently uses a 12-byte payload. The variation found in HPG 1.32 where the positionThreshold is marked as reserved is the only deviation across 9 documents. Most documents include the positionThreshold field at offset 8. The bitfield for 'flags' is identical in all extractions.
